name: places/ChIJ-QiQ9epYwokR1DXnUHjcp3U
adrFormatAddress: 1230 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain selling boho-chic womenswear, shoes, accessories & home decor (some feature wedding attire).

originalText.text: I was overjoyed to snag both my bridal shower dress and second wedding dress at Anthropologie. Huge thanks to the BHLDN and Anthropologie staff for crafting an experience that was not only beautiful and memorable but made me feel like a true princess.

text.text: I was overjoyed to snag both my bridal shower dress and second wedding dress at Anthropologie. Huge thanks to the BHLDN and Anthropologie staff for crafting an experience that was not only beautiful and memorable but made me feel like a true princess.

originalText.text: Eternally grateful to my bridal consultant Allie and her manager! Came here after already having one dress but feeling like I’ve eyed some of the BHLDN dresses for awhile I should just go for it. I’m so glad I did! I picked out the ones I favorited online and Allie encouraged me to try a couple unexpected ones. My first dress (the one I wanted to look at for months) turned out to be the one. Unfortunately for me they did not have my size in stock, online and the waitlist was closed. Allie and the manager worked things out and I took home the sample in new condition. I couldn’t be happier and I’m so appreciative to the team for going above and beyond. Thank you!

originalText.text: Was the last stop of my wedding dress shopping weekend- and certainly saved the BEST for last. Lindsay and Hailey went above and beyond to take care of my and my family. I had just come from an awful experience at Jenny Yoo and they turned the day around! The care and attention these girls give the bride to be is exceptional. Lindsay found the last dress in stock of a dress I loved! Hailey went as far as talking to my grandma about the alterations on the phone. I walked away with my dream dress & the best hype girls! Thank you again for everything! A MUST stop for all brides to be :)

text.text: Was the last stop of my wedding dress shopping weekend- and certainly saved the BEST for last. Lindsay and Hailey went above and beyond to take care of my and my family. originalText.text: Wow, I could not have had a better experience with the women working at this store. I went in looking for an emergency last minute wedding dress (getting married in 1 week!) as I hated the alterations done to my wedding dress I bought at a bridal boutique. All the women rallied around me to help me find the right dress and make sure I’d have something in time and that I’d love. I had no friends or family with me as I just flew in from Australia and all four stayed to give me their opinion on each dress and helped me pick out the perfect dress and earrings. They absolutely did not need to do this and I am so grateful.  I’ve never had that kind of service, including at the high end boutique I bought my original dress from. I’m now so excited for my wedding day and before I was dreading it. Thank you ladies!

originalText.text: Found my dream dress at BHLDN this past weekend! My bridal consultant Kylie truly made the experience so lovely. I was so worried about dress shopping as a plus sized bride but there were so many beautiful dresses to try on in my size. We were treated to champagne and had a lovely corner to enjoy my fitting. I highly recommend Kylie and BHLDN for your bridal shopping.
